char_info.desc: The Cousin of the Phantasmal Percussionist

a0.speaker: Jeanne:
a0.dialogue: No! Are you giving me a taste of my medicine? I must tell you this:

a1.speaker: Jeanne:
a1.dialogue: Those guys didn't mean any harm to your people, so let them be!

a2.speaker: Jeanne:
a2.dialogue: On second thoughts, I finally realized that they really did get out of hand by looking at the people's paranoid looks.

a3.speaker: Jeanne:
a3.dialogue: I really need to tell them more about that so they can still do their thing while not disturbing the people.

a5.speaker: Youmu:
a5.dialogue: But I heard that Sumi secretly gave the mastermind of the labyrinth a headpat and call him a smol bean.

a6.speaker: Youmu:
a6.dialogue: I wonder if they are actually cute like what she said or not...
